text: Thanks Rob. On the test plan spreadsheet, I had a tab in there with my hourly estimates. I’m not sure if we want to share that externally or not, since I was thinking of that as internal. I pulled it out into a separate worksheet just in case.
I shared that worksheet with you, so you still have access. I can add it back to the original test plan if you do think it ought to be there.
Good catch! Thanks Megan. How's BC?
So far so good. Yesterday was HOT in the 90s. Today is a little more reasonable in the mid 80s. Still hotter than you’d like for a long run.
“Town" is probably overstating the size of it. It’s very small, mostly full of athletes. Great if you’re a climber, runner, or cyclist. I’m enjoying the French language Olympic TV.
